Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Hillary Clinton was caught on tape laughing about Hurricane Irma "wiping out all of those Florida hillbillies." This statement is not true.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Hillary Clinton did not make these remarks.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is sourced from a fake news website.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Hillary Clinton would make disparaging remarks about Floridians facing a natural disaster.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the claim originated from a network of Internet trolls who create fabricated stories.
